title: Shark® Genius™ Steam Pocket® Mop: the Benefits of Steam
description: Discover the benefits of using your Shark Genius Steam Pocket Mop and the power of steam.

asset.title: Shark® Genius™ Steam Pocket® Mop: the Benefits of Steam
asset.description: Discover the benefits of using your Shark Genius Steam Pocket Mop and the power of steam. To learn more, visit – http://www.sharkclean.com/hard-floor-care/genius-steam-pocket-mop-series/
asset.author: Shark Cleaning

transcripts: Concentrated steam cleans your floors and helps take care of tough spots, dried up messes and stuck on stains all without chemicals. That makes mopping easy, fast and less of a chore. Say goodbye too long drying time the genius mop heads advanced maneuverability gives you incredible under and around furniture range and the steam blaster technology tackles stuck on stains of messes with a simple flip of the mop head. Steam is the perfect way to clean your sealed hard floors.
